required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: SocknLeg - a User Friendly Medical Compression Study of a Modified Application of a Medical Device
clinical_study.official_title: SocknLeg - a User Friendly Medical Compression Study of a Modified Application of a Medical Device

brief_summary.textblock: The study intends to investigate a novel compression system termed Socknleg composed of an understocking covering the foot with three added stockings extending from the ankle to the knee without covering the foot. The novel Socknleg system is compared to a standard class III compression stocking.

detailed_description.textblock: The investigator tests a novel compression system termed Socknleg in 20 healthy individuals and 20 patients with chronic venous disease. Socknleg is composed of an understocking covering the foot with three added stockings extending from the ankle to the knee without covering the foot. The novel Socknleg system is compared to a standard class III compression stocking. Outcome measures are successful donning and the comparison of interface pressure measured on the level of the ankle.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Successful donning has to be completed within 5 minutes.
primary_outcome.description: Ability to fully done the investigated compression devices.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Interface pressure is measured within 5 minutes of complete donning of the stocking.
secondary_outcome.description: Interface pressure of the compression systems is measured at level cB1 (transition of the Achilles tendon to the calf muscle) in mmHg by a pressure measuring device termed PicopressÂ® . Interface pressure is compared between the novel compression system and the comparator, a class III compression stocking.

arm_group.description: To done a novel compression system. 20 healthy subjects and 20 patients done a novel compression system termed Socknleg and a compression class III stocking as a comparator.The Socknleg compression system was developed by the investigator and produced by Sigvaris AG, St. Gallen, Switzerland.

intervention.intervention_name: (Socknleg)To done of a novel compression system
intervention.description: To done a novel compression system.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers: age > 18 years, proband information read, consent form signed
- Patients: age > 18 years, chronic venous insufficiency CEAP C5 (healed venous ulcer).Age > 18 year, patient information read, consent signed.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Active venous ulcer
- Peripheral arterial disease
- Peripheral neuropathy

facility.name: Department of Dermatology, University Hospital of Zurich, Switzerland
